original_text: Take the male sheep that makes Aaron God's special servant. Cook its meat in a holy place in the yard of the tabernacle.
korean_text: 너는 위임식 숫양을 가져다가 거룩한 곳에서 그 고기를 삶고

sentences.original_text: that makes Aaron God's special servant
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 아론을 하나님의 특별한 종으로 만듭니다

sentences.original_text: Cook its meat in a holy place
in the yard of the tabernacle
